title: 120+ Funny Lines & Quotes to Make Your BFFs Smile

steps.title: Start your friend’s day with a laugh by sharing a quick-witted quip.
steps.content: Start your friend’s day with a laugh by sharing a quick-witted quip. Snappy one-liners are the perfect way to give your buddy a quick boost when they need it the most. Even more importantly, sharing laughter with your friends is a great way to bond and strengthen your friendship. It’s also a great way to get going in the morning because it gets your heart pumping and releases endorphins (the happiness hormones) in your brain. [1] X Trustworthy Source Mayo Clinic Educational website from one of the world's leading hospitals Go to source “Friends are therapists you can drink with.” “No one will ever be as entertained by us as us.” “You don't have to be crazy to be my friend. I'll train you.” “True friends don't judge each other. They judge other people together.” “A friend knows your stories and still appears in public with you.” “If I send you my ugly selfies, our friendship is real.” “Friends buy you food. Best friends eat your food.” “If you have crazy friends, you have everything you’ll ever need.” “If you are lucky enough to find a weirdo just like you, never let them go.” “Friends are the bacon bits in the salad bowl of life.” “The best friends make you question why you bothered with normalcy.” “Friends don't let friends do silly things…alone.”

steps.title: Celebrate your ride-or-die friendships with a laugh-out-loud line.
steps.content: Celebrate your ride-or-die friendships with a laugh-out-loud line. Through good times and bad, you know your friend is always going to be by your side. They lower your stress , improve your feelings of self-worth, and help you cope with life when things aren’t going your way. [2] X Trustworthy Source Mayo Clinic Educational website from one of the world's leading hospitals Go to source Give some of that support back by making them laugh with a quote that perfectly captures the beautiful chaos of best friendships. “A good friend knows all your stories; a best friend helped you write them.” “Best friends: they know how crazy you are and still choose to be seen in public with you.” “I'd walk through fire for my best friend. Well, not fire because that's dangerous. But a super humid room...well, not too humid, because, you know...my hair.” “Crazy friends are the best friends.” “Best friends don’t get offended when you insult them. They smile and call you something even more offensive.” “Real friendship is when your friend comes over to your house, and then you both just take a nap.” “A good friend will help you move. But a best friend will help you move a dead body.” - Jim Hayes “A best friend is someone who thinks you're a good egg even though they know you're slightly cracked.” “Strangers think I’m quiet, my friends think I’m outgoing, but my best friends know I’m completely insane. “If you have a best friend as weird as you, you have everything.” “We’ll be best friends forever because you already know too much.”

steps.title: Help your friend laugh at life with a well-timed wisecrack.
steps.content: Help your friend laugh at life with a well-timed wisecrack. Humor is a great way to help someone de-stress and cope. Besides, it just feels good to laugh. [3] X Research source It’s also a gentle reminder to you both that life is better with friends by your side. Share these lines when your friend needs to find a little humor in life’s challenges…or when you want to remind them you’re on this crazy journey together. “It is one of the blessings of old friends that you can afford to be stupid with them." – Ralph Waldo Emerson “We’ll always be friends because I don't have to act socially acceptable around you.” “Friends offer free therapy.” “Friendship is born at that moment when one person says to another, ‘What! You too? I thought I was the only one.’” – C.S. Lewis “Good friends will mourn your death; best friends will come and clean your computer history immediately after you die.” “Friendship must be built on a solid foundation of alcohol, sarcasm, inappropriateness, and shenanigans.” “Friendship is so weird. You just pick a human you’ve met, and you’re like, ‘Yep, I like this one,’ and you just do stuff with them.” “Friends come and go, like waves of the ocean, but the true ones stay like an octopus on your face.” “Best friends don’t care if your house is clean. They care if you have wine.” “There is nothing like puking with somebody to make you into old friends.” – Sylvia Plath “Friendship is like peeing your pants. Everyone can see it, but only you can feel its warmth.”

steps.title: Hit them with a favorite funny line from Hollywood to have them howling.
steps.content: Hit them with a favorite funny line from Hollywood to have them howling. Friends often bond over liking the same things, like TV shows, books, and movies. Remind them of your bond with a reference to your favorite funny moment from pop culture. It shows them you’re someone who not only knows them well but also “gets” them…and their humor. [4] X Research source “If I murdered someone, she's the person I'd call to help me drag the corpse across the living room floor.” – Meredith, Grey’s Anatomy “Turk and I met over a Bloomin’ Onion. I like to think of it as a metaphor for our relationship because it’s delicious but not really so healthy.” JD – Scrubs “I stepped up! She’s my friend, and she needed help. If I had to, I’d pee on any one of you.” – Joey, Friends “Hoes before bros. Ovaries before brovaries. Uteruses before duderuses.” – Leslie Knope, Parks & Rec “I’m so jealous. That’s it. I’ve got to get some dumb, ugly friends.” – Lane, Gilmore Girls “I tend to think of myself as a one-man wolf pack. But when my sister brought Doug home, I knew he was one of my own. And my wolf pack... it grew by one.” – Alan, The Hangover “Knowledge cannot replace friendship. I’d rather be an idiot than lose you.” – Patrick, Spongebob Squarepants “If you don't have anything nice to say about anybody, come sit by me.” – Clairee, Steele Magnolias “She’s my friend because we both know what it’s like to have people be jealous of us.” – Cher, Clueless “I've literally been here for two hours, and I haven't spoken to anybody. I'm so happy to see you; I could murder you.” – Shoshanna, Girls “Gretchen, I’m sorry I laughed at you that time you got diarrhea at Barnes & Noble. And I’m sorry for telling everyone about it. And I’m sorry for repeating it now.” – Karen, Mean Girls “You are my best friend! Don’t you ever call anybody else that!” – Ilana, Broad City

steps.title: Dropping some rizz on them to keep your friendship game going strong.
steps.content: Dropping some rizz on them to keep your friendship game going strong. Rizz lines aren’t just for dating. The same charm and smooth communication skills can help you strengthen your friendships. [5] X Research source So, use a little of your magnetic energy to slide into your bestie’s DMs to cheer them up with a playful line that combines humor with a little charm and charisma. “Bad decisions make good stories. Let's write another chapter tonight!” “I want to be the reason you look down at your phone and smile. Then walk into a pole.” “We have the kind of weird conversations that make me think if anyone heard us, they’d put us in a mental hospital.” “I hope we never get tired of making jokes about each other.” “Wanna be the ‘she’ to my ‘nanigans’?” “Are you a cellphone? Because I can’t live without you.” “I’d choose your company over pizza anytime. And that’s the best compliment I can give.” “You drink too much. Cuss too much. You have questionable morals. You’re everything I ever wanted in a friend.” “I love how the pictures you take always beautifully show our most treasured memories. Now, put the camera down, and let's make some bad decisions.” “Wanna make questionable life choices?” “Let’s be the old ladies causing trouble in the nursing homes in 30 or 40 years.” “Feel my shirt. You know what it’s made of? Best friend material.”

steps.title: Break the ice and forge new connections with a clever line.
steps.content: Break the ice and forge new connections with a clever line. Making a new friend is a lot easier if you lead with laughter. There’s some evidence that what you find funny says something about your personality. [6] X Research source So, when you share laughter with another person, it makes them feel like you’re on the same page. “I can tell by your sarcastic undertones, rude comments, and sheer lack of common decency that we should be friends.” “This seems like a really bad idea…so obviously, I’m in.” “Excuse me, I'm a bit lost. Can you direct me to the nearest bottle of wine?” “I’m not great at small talk, but I’m really good at making things awkward if you’re into that.” “You don’t have to be crazy to be my friend. But it helps.” “You had me at ‘I hate her too.’” “I’m out of my mind… be back in five minutes!” “Do you like water? If so, you’ll like 60% of me!”

steps.title: Combine heart with humor to make your cards stand out.
steps.content: Combine heart with humor to make your cards stand out. These days, people stay in touch through text, social media, or email. A greeting card carries a deeper meaning because the person you send it to knows you made an effort to choose or make the perfect card . [7] X Research source So, add even more personality and meaning to your card with a funny quote! “One loyal friend is worth ten thousand relatives.” – Euripides “Friends give advice. Best friends give you bad advice and yell, ‘You only live once!’” “Friends are like bras; they’re close to your heart and always there for support.” “I am your best friend, and there isn’t anything you can do about it!” “You’re the friend I’d feel the worst about killing in a post-apocalyptic death match for food.” “We’ve been friends for so long, I can’t remember which one of us is the bad influence.” “You laugh. I laugh. You cry. I cry. You jump off a cliff. I yell, 'Do a flip!’” “We are best friends. Always remember that if you fall, I’ll pick you up…after I finish laughing.” “You’re mad. Bonkers. Off your head. But I’ll tell you a secret: Some of the best people are.” – Lewis Carroll, Alice In Wonderland “Let's face it. The only reason we're friends is because no one else wanted us. But I wouldn’t change a thing.” “We’ll be friends til we’re old and senile… Then we’ll be new friends.” “Friends give you a shoulder to cry on. But best friends are ready with a shovel to hurt the person who made you cry.”

steps.title: Add the perfect hint of humor to your bestie’s big day with a funny quote.
steps.content: Add the perfect hint of humor to your bestie’s big day with a funny quote. A wedding is a joyous occasion, but it can also cause the happy couple more than a little stress. Help your friend relax on their special day with a little humor that helps them laugh at the things that cause them to stress out and relieve some of their tension. [8] X Research source “Please give your new spouse this message from me: ‘If you hurt my best friend, I can make your death look like an accident.’” “On your wedding day, I want to remind you that I will text you fifty times in a row and feel no shame. You’re my friend, and you literally signed up for this. No spouse can change that.” “It’s the friends you can call up at 4 a.m. that matter. I consider this a fair warning to your spouse.” “I’m so happy you finally found that one special person you want to annoy for the rest of your life.” “Marriage is a sort of friendship recognized by the police.” – Robert Louis Stevenson “I’ll always be your shoulder to cry on. And if your new spouse makes you cry, I’ll bring the shovel.” “Love is blind. Friendship sees but tries not to notice.” “The next time you face your new spouse, just remember you’re looking into the eyes of the person who is statistically most likely to murder you.” “You're the friend I'd feel comfortable singing ‘Bohemian Rhapsody’ with in the car during a road trip. I hope your new spouse has earplugs.”

steps.title: Make your friend’s birthday more fun with some good-natured ribbing.
steps.content: Make your friend’s birthday more fun with some good-natured ribbing. Whether your best friend has the “birthday blues” or you just want to hear them snort-laugh, a good funny line is your best bet. For some people, a birthday can cause them to feel depressed or lonely. [9] X Research source Share a funny birthday wish to remind them you’re right there next to them on their journey to help them laugh at how silly life can be. “Hope your birthday is as interesting and wonderful as I am! That’ll be tough to beat.” “Roses are red. Violets are blue. Your wrinkles look great – happy birthday to you!” “It's hard to find a cute, loving, generous, caring, and smart friend. My advice to y'all is, don't lose me. Happy birthday!” “Happy birthday! Make sure you have a fire extinguisher on hand for all the candles you have to light tonight!” “Happy birthday to the one person who understands all my weird facial expressions!” “Whoa, have you unlocked that senior discount yet? Happy birthday!” “Dear friend, you’re on my mind today. Everyone else is on my nerves. Happy birthday!” “Happy birthday! I’d toast you, but I don’t want you to feel too warm.” “A good friend knows how to keep your secrets. A great friend isn't afraid to blackmail you with them. Happy birthday!” “I love that our effortless friendship fits perfectly with my laziness, which is why I got you a card for your birthday.” “Don't worry about getting older. You're still as young as your sense of humor...and we all know how much you love fart jokes.” “Happy birthday to someone who isn't showing their age—or acting it, either.”

steps.title: Take your caption game to the next level with a hilarious line.
steps.content: Take your caption game to the next level with a hilarious line. The perfect hilarious – and Instagram-worthy – caption shows off your wit while giving your friends a chuckle. We’ve all heard about the cons of social media, but it’s a great way to find new friends and stay connected to people we care about. [10] X Trustworthy Source HelpGuide Nonprofit organization dedicated to providing free, evidence-based mental health and wellness resources. Go to source Whether you share a meme or funny photo of the two of you, a hilarious caption makes it that much better. “God made us besties because He knew our moms couldn’t handle us as sisters.” “Yes, we know how obnoxious we are together. No, we don’t care.” “Rollin’ with this squad until the wheels fall off!” “We don't need a filter, just group therapy.” “She knows where the bodies are. In fact, she helped bury a few.” “I think we’ll be friends forever…because we’re too lazy to find new friends.” “The dip to my chip.” “The only thing tighter than our friendship is our jeans.” “We put down our wine for this.” “We put the 'we' in weirdos.”

steps.title: Give your friend group a laugh with texts that keep them in stitches.
steps.content: Give your friend group a laugh with texts that keep them in stitches. Make your friend laugh over text with a random, funny check-in or share an inside joke to stay in touch with your bestie. And if you haven’t texted a friend in a while and want to reconnect, send them a funny line to get over some of the awkwardness. Your friend will probably be happy to hear from you. [11] X Trustworthy Source American Psychological Association Leading scientific and professional organization of licensed psychologists Go to source “I'd take a nerf bullet for you.” “I'm not ignoring you. I'm just trying to figure out the perfect GIF to respond with.” “Goofy pictures and crazy times. Sisters at heart and partners in crime.” “You’re my favorite person to be socially awkward with.” “I’m the friend you have to explain to your other friends before they meet me.” “I have an inferiority complex, but it’s not a very good one.” “I like you because you join in all my weirdness.” “I know I’m wildly interesting, but let’s talk about you.” “I’d take a bullet for you. Not in the head. But like in the leg or something.” “9 out of 10 voices in my head tell me I’m crazy. You’re the 10th.” “You and I are more than friends. We’re like a really small gang.”
